attributes.action: ENSURE THAT RICHARD PYM AND THE LIKE DO NOT RECEIVE T ANY BONUSES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The prime minister MUST ensure that nobody including the above person does not receive any of these ridiculous bonuses that are being banded about.
I heard one of your spokesmen on the T/V the other night saying if they do not receive these bonuses then they will go elswhere, any company that was mad enough to employ somebody who can get a bank into such a state would be welcome to them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
